footer.about: Magnificent Holiday Home Rental is a trusted marketplace where guests can rent fully equipped luxury holiday homes in the prime locations of Dubai, with easy access to local amenities and the added benefit of space and freedom to live a home-from-home experience.

aboutUs.income: Leverage our local market expertise and tried and tested strategies to increase your rental income X4 times without lifting a finger.
aboutUs.safe: Property listing, refurbishing, thorough guest screening, worry-free maintenance, and immaculate cleaning; we take care of it all.
aboutUs.flexible: Back in town? Want to use the vacation house yourself? Just let us know and we will make sure it is all yours!
